entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
